qas.question: What is a person who follows Christianity called?

context: A <a0_0><b8_0>Christian<b8_0/><a0_0/> ( pronunciation (help·info)) is a person who adheres to <b4_0>Christianity<b4_0/>, an Abrahamic, monotheistic religion based on the life and teachings of <a1_0>Jesus Christ<a1_0/>. "<b5_0>Christian<b5_0/>" derives from the Koine Greek word <a2_0><b6_0>Christós<b6_0/><a2_0/> (Χριστός), a translation of the Biblical Hebrew term <a3_0><b7_0>mashiach<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
